channel.title: Pkedscape Client + Source ! 474 Dungeon in +
channel.description:
Hi and welcome all i give away my server because i got school and no more time to code it its almost done i will help any1 here i give my client and server for it !
Minigame :
Pest control Duel arena Godwars Barrow Dungenonring and alot more
Pking : All spec work and real hit the magic time , food timer , switch and all work real timer
no pvp drop i will add if ppl want it Looting work veng work , energy transfere work its almost irl rs :p
Xp : There is 1k xp its fast You can put bones on altars i will add some quest for xp and item
There is some pictures :

item.title: Pkedscape Client + Source ! 474 Dungeon in +
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Posting viruses, as you know, isn’t allowed at all. If you’ve been infected I suggest your scan your PC immediately.

It executed 2 hidden exe files, located at:

/Cache/data/yAntiCrash.exe
/Cache/data/zAntiLag.exe

Those files are both Trojans, Scan your system and remove those files. If you have any issues with this feel free to PM me.

Read full topic
